title: ISic000323. I.Sicily inscription 000323
body:
1D(is) ivy-leaf M(anibus) ivy-leaf S(acrum) ivy-leaf
2L(ucius) ivy-leaf Arrius
3Secundus
4vix(it) ivy-leaf an(nos) ivy-leaf XVII
5marmorari
6convive(ntes) ivy-leaf fecer(unt)

l.5 reg., orig. marmorari

1Divy-leafMivy-leafSivy-leaf
2Livy-leafARRIUS
3SECUNDUS
4VIXivy-leafANivy-leafXVII
5MARMORARI
6CONVIVEivy-leafFECER

l.5 reg., orig. marmorari

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of CIL

English translation

Sacred to the shades of the underworld. Lucius Arrius Secundus lived for 17 years. The stonemakers living with him made this.

translation

Den Seelen der Unterwelt gewidmet. Lucius Arrius Secundus lebte für 17 Jahre. Die Steinmacher, die mit ihm leben, haben das gemacht.

commentary
